shows.hostTitle: CSMO, Pipeliner CRM | Former CEO, Huthwaite (SPIN Selling)
shows.hostNotes: 1,600+ episodes hosted. Former CEO of Huthwaite (SPIN Selling). Audience is salespeople and sales leaders. Wants actionable takeaways. Will push back with 'what does the salesperson DO differently?'. Fast, structured, no fluff.
shows.showStats: Top 2% globally | 9,184 YouTube subs | 2M+ views | 59 Apple reviews
anticipatedQuestions: What is the Old Brain / New Brain concept and why does it matter for sales?
How does this change the way a salesperson should structure their pitch?
AI is writing sales emails and automating outreach — where does the human advantage live?
What's the biggest mistake salespeople make when it comes to emotional intelligence?
How does loss aversion factor into the sales process?
What about buyer resistance and objection handling?
Where can people find the book and learn more?

cheatSheet.bookClose: It's called The Divided Brain — available on Amazon and at paullarche.com.
cheatSheet.aiAnswer: The human advantage is authentic emotional connection. AI can optimize for conversion, but it can't sit across the table and make someone feel genuinely understood. That's still a human skill.
cheatSheet.credentialDrop: BookLife Prize 10/10, Editor's Pick 2025 (Publisher's Weekly). Built 5 radio stations from scratch. 40 years in marketing.
deliveryRules: Scene first — open every answer with a real story.
End answers cleanly — land the point, stop, let host pick it up.
Frame everything through the sales lens for this audience.
techChecklist: Open Restream link in Google Chrome
Join 5-10 min early for sound check
Book copy nearby — may ask you to show it

Stumbled on book title at close — practice until automatic
No scene-first structure — open every answer with a story
